speaker: President.
english:
President. Thank you, Commissioner. The joint debate on these two reports is closed.
The vote will take place tomorrow at 12.00 noon.
Written statements (Rule 142 of the Rules of Procedure)
original:
President. Thank you, Commissioner. The joint debate on these two reports is closed.
The vote will take place tomorrow at 12.00 noon.

agenda_item: Economic policy guidelines for 2007 – Member States’ employment policies (debate)
